DOC.brief_summary: The study perform evaluate accuracy blood glucose level result obtain fingertip use Labstyle Dario Blood Glucose Monitoring System ( BGMS ) compare reference equipment ( YSI 2300 STATPLUS ) evaluate ease use Dario Device lay-person . The participant review Dario user manual guide request operate Dario BGMS perform glucose blood test , ask complete questionnaire . As reference participant test professional caregiver use Dario BGMS YSI 2003 .
DOC.brief_title: Dario™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System - User Performance Evaluation
DOC.detailed_description: Device accuracy assess base acceptance criterion ISO 15197:2003 state : `` The minimum acceptable accuracy result produce glucose monitoring system shall follow : 95 % individual glucose result shall fall within 15 mg/dL result Reference method glucose concentration ≥ 4,2 mmol/L ( ≥ 75 mg/dL ) '' .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 80 Type 1 Type 2 diabetes Drug alcohol abuse Investigator discretion
